text:
I think mod_deflate should not compress content that have
already been manually compressed by webmaster.
mod_deflate can determine it by the 0x1F 0x8B
signature at the head of a file,
and a respective configuration option has to be added,
say,
 'DeflateContent {All|NonCompressed}'.
creator: alex.job@bk.ru
nick@webthing.com
text:
mod_deflate won't compress already-compressed contents, unless the contents are
labelled as not compressed (which is broken, and will cause browsers/etc to
display gibberish).

What leads you to suppose otherwise?
